attributes.additional_details: 17.4 Millions voted to leave the EU, the biggest Mandate in UK voting history, The shortfall for UK's EU budget would be substantial, and as such should be made up by those Remain voters who clearly have no problem with paying more for the EU they are convinced they "Love"
attributes.background: MP's have disgracefully put their will to remain in the EU over the Majority of the peoples mandate to leave, If the Brexit Betrayal is allowed to happen & article 50 is revoked then Every Registered Leave voter should not only be exempt from future EU payments but should compensatory 5 year rebate.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because voters aren't registered as "leave" or "remain". Under UK law someone's vote is private. We're therefore not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
